item.description:
Stress, anger and conflict are part of life in today's world, but you don't have to live with them 24/7. In this interactive program, our facilitator, Jim Rose, will engage you through a series of exercises designed to show how meditation is a powerful tool for dealing with stress, anger and conflict. Through several meditation periods, you will have a chance to see how meditation also is the key to a rich inner life.

This program repeats on Saturday, September 19, 10am to 11:30am at the Scandinvian Living Center, 206 Waltham St., West Newton 02465.

group.name: The Science of Spirituality Meditation Meetup

item.name: MEDITATION -- A Spiritual Solution to Stress, Anger and Conflict
